q: why does the man wear life jackets during drifting
pred: The man is wearing life jackets to ensure his safety while drifting on the river. Life jackets are essential for providing buoyancy and keeping the person afloat in case of an accident or if they fall into the water. The video shows the man wearing a life jacket while drifting, which indicates that he is taking necessary precautions to ensure his safety during this activity.
